text: Yuriy Chyrkov (; 22 December 1947 – 19 April 2014There died famous Transcarpathian footballer and coach Yuriy Chyrkov (Помер відомий закарпатський футболіст та тренер Юрій Чирков). Mukachevo.net (FC Hoverla). 19 April 2014) is a former professional Soviet football midfielder and coach. ==References == ==External links== * Category:1947 births Category:2014 deaths Category:People from Vynohradiv Raion Category:Soviet footballers Category:FC Mukacheve players Category:FC Hoverla Uzhhorod players Category:Ukrainian football managers Category:FC Hoverla Uzhhorod managers Category:Association football midfielders
title: Yuriy Chyrkov
